## skateboard up

Spinup the application and all its services

```
skateboard up [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force     Pass --force when syncing
  -h, --help      help for up
  -n, --no-sync   Skip syncing repositories
```

* [skateboard](skateboard.md)	 - Pack your services once
